subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Seahawks’ Kam Chancellor punched the ball loose from the Lions’ Calvin Johnson, who was diving for the end zone, for a touchback with less than two minutes remaining, which sealed Seattle’s victory.
snippet: The Seahawks’ Kam Chancellor punched the ball loose from the Lions’ Calvin Johnson, who was diving for the end zone, for a touchback with less than two minutes remaining, which sealed Seattle’s victory.
